page.title: 15A Child in Calbourne
page.content: I am a{twelve year old girl.}I get up at 7.30 and have cereal and milk for my breakfast. The school bus collects me from the cross roads at 8am. I go to school in Freshwater eight miles away. I have a cooked lunch at Noon. We have four lessons in the morning and three in the afternoon. The school bus drops me home at 4.15pm. My Mother only works part time so she is able to give me Beans and egg between 5 and 6pm. Sometimes I ride my bicycle in the evening otherwise I watch television until bedtime between 9 and 10pm.
